page.title: 01Starting the day.
page.content: I'm Claire.I get up at 7.20. My dad gets up at 7.00. My mum gets up at 7.15. My sister,Michelle,gets up at 7.30. We all get dressed and have a wash. Then my mum has to shout at Michelle all the time and tell her what to do.My sister is very slow.My mum and dad go downstairs for some breakfast. My sister and I don't have any breakfast.When we are ready, we go downstairs and do the washing and wiping up.By the time we have done the washing up our friends have come round.I leave home at 8.00 but my tortoise sister leaves home at 8.30.I arrive at school at about 20 past 8. Then we start the school day, but that's another story!
